strategies.name: conservative
strategies.description: Set threshold below current price for up (margin 0.5%). High accuracy, low return.

strategies.name: momentum
strategies.description: Trend continuation based on recent price movement direction.

strategies.name: mean_reversion
strategies.description: Reversion bet when price deviates >2 sigma from recent mean.

strategies.name: consensus
strategies.description: Multi-source oracle divergence as directional signal.
